reviewText: (VHS Video) You will learn:  How the magic of compounding interest will increase your wealth.  Your risk tolerance levels.  Historical returns for bonds, bills and common stocks.  Financial strategies like diversification, dollar cost averaging, and market timing.  The different types of funds.  How to read a prospectus.  And how to get started investing in Mutual Funds, the easy way to make money.  This 50 minute tape is filled with graphics and is designed to make it informational as well as fun to watch.
